description.value:
The Domain you grant to your followers (See @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-ancestries-demigods.journals-dnd5e.JournalEntry.CqQoQpvqEOehOwgL.JournalEntryPage.ITImTyYjZ91IQtQx#building-a-religion]{Building a Religion}) also grants you two 1st-level spells that you always have prepared. You can cast these spells using any spell slots you have of the appropriate level. When you reach 5th level, your Domain grants you two 2nd-level spells that you always have prepared. Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma is your spellcasting ability for these spells (choose the ability when you select this feat).

  • Life Domain. 1st-level spells: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.8dzaICjGy6mTUaUr]{Bless}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.uUWb1wZgtMou0TVP]{Cure Wounds}; 2nd-level spells: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.Opwh2PdX4runSBlm]{Aid}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.F0GsG0SJzsIOacwV]{Lesser Restoration}
  • Light Domain. 1st-level spells: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.5SuJewoa1CRWaj1F]{Burning Hands}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.nqBDWkVOfcGZt4YU]{Faerie Fire}; 2nd-level spells: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.7u2obDvuvtZBkTfq]{Scorching Ray}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.DQzlB5Y3k791W5bH]{See Invisibility}
  • Trickery Domain. 1st-level spells: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.eS7XnnApoxRxYXPs]{Charm Person}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.A3q2gTNqG6fvNGrv]{Disguise Self}; 2nd-level spells: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.1N8dDMMgZ1h1YJ3B]{Invisibility}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.pRMvmknwLf2tdMTj]{Pass without Trace}
  • War Domain. 1st-level spells: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.7buEm5KhI5lP8m1z]{Guiding Bolt}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.jZ6JNykRtdQ90MOo]{Shield of Faith}; 2nd-level spells: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.Sgjrf8qqv97CCWM4]{Magic Weapon}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.JbxsYXxSOTZbf9I0]{Spiritual Weapon}

system.requirements: Demigod species, Spellcasting or Pact Magic Feature
